sharirika saukhya menma manasika suwayath itha wadagathnawa arahadi buduguna bhawanawaoolkot namaya sihikaramusinhala janathawata samangiyen kriya kirimata nohaki manda?hama welawatama sadharana aakalpawalin yuktha wannamaddepola weramune shri sundararama rajamaha wiharayaambaalawa rahathgal wiharayalokaye wadathma uthum hathara denek handuna ganimumaligawila budu pilimayabudu bathiya ithirena indunisiyawe budukanda borobudurthamange simawa danagena katayuthu karannadharma sakachchamalabe shri panynyathissa daham pasalaapi wemu sirilaka bodu daruwohamawitama dinanna hadanna epaa.po.sa sa/pela buddha dharma padam malawatibet jathika es.mahinda himiyan liyu lama gi saha kawidewdath theraada dewlowa dewangana heta prethayek wiya hakida?buduhamuduruwo samajawadaye ha prajathanthrawadaye aadi karthruwarayanoyilowada sangarawamaithri bhawanawabuddha nithi sangrahayaninda apahasa pasekata damannamanasa puhunu kara ganimata wada satahanakbauddha githayayahapath deyak kiyanna yahapath deyak asewidushkara kriya no kota budu wiya no haki da?akusalraththota ganethanna shri purwarama rajamaha wiharayabhawa sanna sahitha15.
